title: i havent done my taxes in 3 years. IRS finally sent me a letter.
body:
still not gonna do them.

> [{quoted}](name=vampirekid13,realm=EUW,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=aRXkBpnB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-07T08:21:59.703+0000)
>
> i have a very good reason to not do them. i actually cant. i am not able to do my tax returns through most normal channels.
> 
> i am a US citizen living abroad, and a veteran, both of which make my life harder.
> 
> my current country taxes me a flat 30%, im ok with paying it, its taxes, i make money here so i should pay them, but should the US tax me on income that was outside of the US economy? well, its irrelevant what you believe because i dont have the money to hire a tax lawyer to do my taxes properly, i already tried sites like taxslayer and others, cant do it, contacted IRS directly, was told to hire a tax lawyer. well. i wont. GG. extradite me.
